Credit, Fashion, Sex: Economies of Regard in Old Regime France

By

Clare Haru Crowston

Clare Haru Crowston

Clare Haru Crowston is Associate Professor of History at the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign. She is the author of Fabricating Women: The Seamstresses of Old Regime France, 1675â€“1791, also published by Duke University Press.
